眱字的基本解释

眱
dì
古同“睇”，斜视。
熟视不言。

眱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》以脂切，平脂，影。］
(1)同“睇”。斜视。
(2)盯着看而不言语。

眱字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眱； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页806第27
〔古文〕??【廣韻】以脂切【集韻】延知切，?音姨。【玉篇】目小視也。　又【廣韻】熟視不言也。　又【博雅】讎眱，直視也。　又【集韻】田黎切，音題。義同。　又大計切，題去聲。與睇同。

眱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
眱字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
dì
Gu Tong "watches" and squints.
Be familiar with it.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dì］
["Guangyun" cut with fat, flat fat, shadow. ]
(1) Same as "Looking". Squint.
(2) Staring without words.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　眱; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 806 Page 27
[Ancient text]?? [Guang Yun] Cut with Zhi [Ji Yun] Yan Zhi cut, auntie? [Jade articles] Look down.　[Guang Yun] It's familiar to you.　[Bo Ya] again, look straight.　[Jiyun] Tian Liqie, phonetic title. The same meaning.　After another big plan, the question is gone. Same as Sui.
